alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; Logan; McLean; Piatt; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Logan, northern Piatt, De Witt, southern Vermilion, southwestern McLean and southern Champaign Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Danville to near Mansfield to near Stanford. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Danville, Mahomet, Westville, Tilton, Belgium and Lake Of The Woods around 600 PM CDT. White Heath around 605 PM CDT. Bondville and Seymour around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Savoy, Atlanta, Tolono, Pesotum and Waynesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 137 and 154. Interstate 57 between mile markers 222 and 243. Interstate 72 between mile markers 161 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 152 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; De Witt; Logan; McLean; Piatt; Vermilion
